definition: clever and eloquent (idiom); fluent/having the gift of the gab
lit. neither a relative nor a friend (idiom)/fig. unrelated to one another in any way
lit. small belly, chicken's gut (idiom); narrow-minded/petty
to invent crazy nonsense/to cook up (excuses)/to talk at random/wild babble
to defend sb (a relative, friend or oneself) despite knowing that that person is in the wrong
to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
to walk right into the trap
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
to have no sense of shame/brazen
